enhanced_description: Xobin is a rapidly expanding global HRTech company, serving over 800 organizations across 55+ countries. It provides a smart, cloud-based talent assessment platform primarily focused on pre-employment screening, hiring, and internal skill development. The platform offers validated skill-based, role-based, and psychometric assessments. Key features include AI Evaluate, a state-of-the-art Generative AI system for answer evaluation, AI-based proctoring for exam integrity, and automated/live interview capabilities. Xobin also includes Applicant Tracking System (ATS) functionality and an Advanced Coding Simulator, helping organizations streamline hiring, improve interview productivity, reduce recruitment costs, and accelerate the shortlisting process up to 3x faster. It is ideal for growth-stage startups, enterprises, and recruitment consultancies, also supporting learning and development objectives like accelerating skill development and building a more diverse workforce.
